sense.def:
To sling something somewhere
pomeni nekaj vreči nekam.

seg.quote: She slung the book across the room.

sense.def:
To sling something over one's shoulder or over a chair
pomeni nekaj hitro in malomarno dati nekam, da tam visi.

seg.quote: Patrick gets his bag and slings it over his shoulder.
His few bits of clothing were slung over a string on the wall.

sense.def:
To sling something between two points
pomeni nekaj, na primer vrv, pritrditi na dve točki, tako da ohlapno visi med njima.

seg.quote: Pieces of meat were hanging to dry over a rope slung on the wall.

sense.def:
A sling
je predmet iz vrvi, jermenov ali kosa blaga, s katerim nosimo stvari.

cit.quote: nosilna zanka, jermen prek rame, kengurujček (za dojenčka)

seg.quote: Mothers carry their babies around with them in slings.

sense.def:
A sling
je tudi kos blaga, ki si ga zavežemo okoli vratu, da na njem počiva poškodovana roka.

seg.quote: His arm was in a sling.
